Sentencas: In recent years, the solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) scientific community has invested continuous efforts to employ artificial intelligence methods to design and develop new energy systems.
Titulo: Overcoming a recent impasse in the application of artificial neural networks as solid oxide fuel cells simulator with computational topology

Sentencas: It is crucial to gain a better understanding of the microscale phenomena that occur in the electrodes.
Titulo: Overcoming a recent impasse in the application of artificial neural networks as solid oxide fuel cells simulator with computational topology

Sentencas: In this review, we present a literature review of the field, discussing the limitations of including microstructural data in existing research and possible research directions to overcome them.
Titulo: Overcoming a recent impasse in the application of artificial neural networks as solid oxide fuel cells simulator with computational topology

Sentencas: This review focuses on a particular research area that uses artificial neural networks (ANNs) to predict the performance of SOFCs.
Titulo: Overcoming a recent impasse in the application of artificial neural networks as solid oxide fuel cells simulator with computational topology

Sentencas: Herein, we show that neural networks are used not only to conform to the newest trends but also for improving the design and providing a better understanding of microscale phenomena that occur in the electrodes.
Titulo: Overcoming a recent impasse in the application of artificial neural networks as solid oxide fuel cells simulator with computational topology

Sentencas: The review concludes by highlighting topological data analysis as a promising area of research that can incorporate detailed microstructure characterization in ANNs for performance prediction.
Titulo: Overcoming a recent impasse in the application of artificial neural networks as solid oxide fuel cells simulator with computational topology
